General.Name: Hoshine Silicon Ind Co Ltd
General.Description: Hoshine Silicon Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of silicon-based materials in China and internationally. It offers silicon metals and metal powders, and graphite carbon electrodes. The company also provides silicone products comprising hydroxyl terminated polydimethylsiloxane linears, tetramethyldisiloxane, silicone oil, acetic silicone and neutral silicone sealants, methyl hydrogen silicone fluids, polydimethylsiloxane, vinyl terminated silicone fluids, methyltrichlorosilane, dimethyldichlorosilane, trimethylchlorosilane, methyldichlorosilane, tetramethyldisiloxane, dimethylcyclosiloxane, hexamethylcyclotrisiloxane, octamethylcyclotetrasiloxane, decamethylcyclopentasiloxane, fumed silica, precipitated silica, room temperature vulcanized silicone rubber, methyl vinyl silicone rubber, and liquid silicone rubber. Its products are used in aerospace, military, electronic communications, photovoltaic new energy, health care, automobile, and other fields. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Cixi, China.
